sentences.cn: 谈起话来,总离不了中暑.

sentences.en: He did not feel quite right; maybe he got sunstroke.
sentences.cn: 他感觉不太舒服; 也许是有点中暑.

sentences.en: He had sunstroke and dropped out.
I suddenly felt dizzy . I must have suffered sunstroke.
sentences.cn: 我突然感到头晕眼花,可能是中暑了.

sentences.en: I was suffering from acute sunstroke, starvation and exhaustion.
It's too hot – you could easily get sunstroke.
Mother was afraid we would get sunstroke while fishing on such a hot day.
sentences.cn: 母亲担心我们这么热的天钓鱼会中暑.

sentences.en: One who works under the hot sun is liable to sunstroke.
sentences.cn: 在炎热的阳光底下工作很容易引起中暑.

sentences.en: Someone who is suffering from sunstroke feels dizzy and has a high temperature.
sentences.cn: 中暑的人会头晕、发高烧.

sentences.en: Statistically, ninety-eight percent of all acute sunstroke cases are fatal.
sentences.cn: 据统计，急性中暑病例中有98%是致命的。

sentences.en: Ventilating safety helmet with holes, high capability of ventilation and sunstroke prevention.
sentences.cn: 透孔通风式安全帽, 适用于夏季露天作业工人佩带,通风防署性能好.

sentences.en: What food sunstroke prevention does the summer eat best?
sentences.cn: 夏季吃什么食品防暑最好?

sentences.en: What fruit is OK of sunstroke prevention?
sentences.cn: 什么水果是可以防暑的?

trans.tran_en: fever, weakness etc caused by being outside in the sun for too long
